job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: PRIMARY DUTIES -Develop code in C#, which occasional work in C/C++ -Design and create GUIs for data analysis applications -Enhance and debug existing coding and applications -Perform unit testing and system-level testing of software -Document software from an engineering and end-user perspective SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS -Must be a current US citizen and willing to work on-site and not remotely -Expertise in C# (WPF and WinForms) -Understanding of object-oriented programming -Ability to perform multi-threaded programming -Knowledge of TCP/IP networking -Fluency with serialization via YAML, JSON, and XML -Familiarity with C++ -Experience with databases, such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQLite -Prior use with development tools, such as Visual Studio, Git, and Buildbot -Proficiency in unit testing and systems-level testing -Empathy for users and a drive for customer delight
